name: 60SecondSalesCoach
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Weekly application of a single selling skill designed to challenge. Created to remind you daily, throughout a week, to focus on a single skill. Fifty-two weeks of free coaching sessions designed to get you to think more, think better and think differently. The result, an opportunity for greater success in sales.

These skills come from over twenty years of training and over 20,000 individuals.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
